data.title: Watch Oliver Platt TV Shows & Movies Online
data.meta_description: Dig into all the Oliver Platt TV Shows and Movies you want with your Stan account. Enjoy unlimited access to TV and Movies from all your favourite actors on all your devices.
data.text:
A Time To Kill

In Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer defends a black man on trial for murdering the two white men who raped his ten-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan. Based on the novel by John Grisham.

Love & Other Drugs

Polar opposites Jamie, a womanising pharmaceutical salesman on the corporate fast track, and Maggie, a mysterious free spirit with early-onset Parkinson's disease, find themselves taken by surprise when they fall victim to life’s ultimate drug: love.

2012

Never before has a date in history been so significant to so many cultures, religions, scientists, and governments. 2012 is an epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

Chef

When Chef Carl Casper quits his job at a prominent Los Angeles restaurant, he is left to figure out what’s next. Taking to the road, Chef Carl goes back to his roots to reignite his passion for the kitchen - and zest for life and love.

Indecent Proposal

David and Diana are a loving couple who are facing financial ruin. When they head to Las Vegas hoping to save their house, they meet a mysterious billionaire who offers a solution to their money problems: $1 million - if he can sleep with Diana.

Kill the Messenger

Based on the true story of Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist Gary Webb, who uncovered a conspiracy involving the men smuggling crack cocaine into America, and the role the CIA played in it as they used profits to arm rebel fighters in Nicaragua.
